title: Temperament unsuited
brief_description: The narrative explores the predicament faced by an unconventional student teacher attempting to orient himself to the conservative world of secondary school teaching. Cast includes Steve J. Spears, Robyn Nevin, Deborah Kennedy, Ken Goodlet, Peter Carroll, Jude Kuring, Paul Mason, Jenny McNae, Max Phipps, Phil Ross.
